en_text: Two is a lot!
jp_text: ２件もありゃ 多々でしょ～！
google_translated: There are 2 cases and there are many!

en_text: I'll go out and look for him.
jp_text: 俺 ちょっと外見てくる！

en_text: Man... Where did Hibito go?
jp_text: くっそ～ どこ行った～ 日々人～｡

en_text: Next time, try to concentrate harder.
jp_text: 次からはしっかり集中して下さい｡
google_translated: Please concentrate firmly from the next.

en_text: Did you tell Hibito that he can't go to space anymore, Butler?
jp_text: ｢もう君は宇宙へは行けない｣と➡
google_translated: "You can not go to space already"

en_text: He could at least send a reply.
jp_text: 《返信くらいして来いってんだよ》

en_text: It's been six days since Hibito vanished.
jp_text: 《日々人がいなくなって

en_text: Let's go to bed. is that all you have to say?
jp_text: 寝よ～かじゃねぇだろ！
google_translated: I'm going to go to bed!

en_text: You didn't hear it?
jp_text: 聞こえるか アホッ｡

en_text: So telepathy works!
jp_text: やっぱ通じるじゃん テレパシー！

en_text: And I can drink all the beer.
jp_text: ビールも一人じめ！

en_text: And I can sing all I want!
jp_text: 遠慮なく歌えるぅ～

en_text: And I can watch whatever I want on TV!
jp_text: 見れるぅ～

en_text: See you tomorrow. yep, sure thing.
jp_text: ああ もちろん｡

en_text: And if you start crying, you'll be raining on any sunny day.
jp_text: [TV]でね もし君が…｡

en_text: I don't recognize this number.
jp_text: 誰だ この番号？

en_text: Did something happen?
jp_text: 何か…あったんですか？

en_text: Then he didn't tell you anything.
jp_text: やはり 聞いてはいないか｡

en_text: Where are you?
jp_text: 《どこ行った!?》

en_text: I thought you could use telepathy.
jp_text: テレパシー使えんだろ｡

en_text: I can't hear a thing!
jp_text: 全然聴こえてこねぇんだよ！

en_text: He completed the test without an attack.
jp_text: 発作も出ずにやり終えて➡

en_text: You should keep your mouth shut.
jp_text: 君はでしゃばるべきではない｡➡

en_text: The weather's too nice.
jp_text: アホみたいに天気いいな｡

en_text: I came too early...
jp_text: 早く着きすぎたし…｡

en_text: You're doing well.
jp_text: [TV]了解｡

en_text: Confirm that all thruster nozzles are operational.
jp_text: 全ての逆噴射ノズル稼動を確認…｡
google_translated: Check all reverse injection nozzle operation ....

en_text: At this rate, we'll have to land in a rocky area, thirty kilometers away.
jp_text: このままだと３０キロ先の
google_translated: If this is left, 30 kilometers ahead

en_text: What do we do, Houston?
jp_text: あ あれ!?

en_text: CAPCOM, what's going on?
jp_text: キャプコム これは何事だ！

en_text: and he has overcome that fear!
jp_text: それを乗り越えた男です｡
google_translated: It is a man who got over it.

en_text: Hello, this is Butler.
jp_text: もしもし バトラーだ｡

en_text: Are you available to meet right now?
jp_text: 今からどこかで会えませんか？
google_translated: Can you meet somewhere from now?

en_text: Wh-What's this light?
jp_text: 《ん!?なんだこの光 まぶしい！》

en_text: I can't see...
jp_text: あっ 君は まさか!?

en_text: As an apology, I'll give you this.
jp_text: お詫びに これをあげるよ｡➡

en_text: I-It tastes great!
jp_text: 《な なんだこの味は!?》

en_text: Strange... Nothing's wrong with him.
jp_text: 不思議 異常がニャいわ｡

en_text: And go find them!
jp_text: 彼らを探しに行こう！➡
